explicit

Class ConstructModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • prism.PrismComponent
      • explicit.ConstructModel

  • public class ConstructModel
extends PrismComponent
    Class to perform explicit-state reachability and model construction. The information about the model to be built is provided via a ModelGenerator interface. To build a PRISM model, use ModulesFileModelGenerator.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      • constructModel

        Throws:
        PrismException

      • constructModel

        public Model constructModel(ModelGenerator modelGen,
                            boolean justReach)
                     throws PrismException
        Construct an explicit-state model and return it. If justReach is true, no model is built and null is returned; the set of reachable states can be obtained with getStatesList().
        Parameters:
        modelGen - The ModelGenerator interface providing the model
        justReach - If true, just build the reachable state set, not the model
        Throws:
        PrismException
